part exchange.translation[0].definitions: a way of buying a new car, television etc in which you give your old car, television etc as part of the payment
The company takes the buyerâ€™s property in part exchange.
part exchange.translation[1].definitions: a way of buying a new car, television etc in which you give the seller your old car etc as part of the payment, or a car etc given as part of the payment for something new
He sold the car in part-exchange for another vehicle.
